alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:55PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Custer and central Fall River Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm producing a landspout 5 miles east of Edgemont, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cascade Falls around 515 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include northwestern Angostura Reservoir, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Hot Springs and Cold Brook Reservoir. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
